#!/bin/bash

# è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥å¿—å¤„ç†è„šæœ¬ - mainç”¨æˆ·ç‰ˆæœ¬
LOG_DIR="/home/main/logs"
NGINX_LOG="/var/log/nginx/access.log"
TIMESTAMP=$(date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M")
OUTPUT_FILE="$LOG_DIR/stats_$TIMESTAMP.json"

# ç¡®ä¿æ—¥å¿—ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR"

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»24å°æ—¶æ•°æ®
echo "ç”Ÿæˆ24å°æ—¶è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡..." > "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

# æå–ä¸»é¡µè®¿é—®è®°å½•å¹¶ç»Ÿè®¡æ¯å°æ—¶è®¿é—®é‡
cat "$NGINX_LOG" /var/log/nginx/access.log.1 2>/dev/null | \
grep -E "GET / HTTP" | \
awk '{print $4}' | \
sed 's/\[//g' | \
cut -d: -f2 | \
sort -n | \
uniq -c > /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# ç”ŸæˆJSONæ ¼å¼æ•°æ®
echo '{"hourly_data":[' > "$OUTPUT_FILE"

total=0
peak_count=0
peak_hour=0

for hour in {0..23}; do
    count=$(grep -E "^\s*[0-9]+\s+$(printf "%02d" $hour)$" /tmp/hourly_raw.txt | awk '{print $1}')
    [[ -z "$count" ]] && count=0
    
    total=$((total + count))
    
    if [[ $count -gt $peak_count ]]; then
        peak_count=$count
        peak_hour=$hour
    fi
    
    if [[ $hour -eq 23 ]]; then
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    else
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}," >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    fi
done

avg=$((total / 24))

cat >> "$OUTPUT_FILE" << EOF
],
"summary":{
"total_visits":$total,
"peak_hour":"$(printf "%02d:00" $peak_hour)",
"avg_hourly":$avg,
"last_update":"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')"
},
"timestamp":"$TIMESTAMP"
}
EOF

# æ¸…ç†æ—§æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶(ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘10ä¸ª)
ls -t "$LOG_DIR"/stats_*.json 2>/dev/null | tail -n +11 | xargs rm -f 2>/dev/null || true

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# åŒæ­¥åˆ°wwwå­˜å‚¨æ¡¶çš„logç›®å½•
cp "$OUTPUT_FILE" "/mnt/www/log/" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "$(date): Stats generated - $OUTPUT_FILE, Total: $total visits" >> "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

#!/bin/bash

# è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥å¿—å¤„ç†è„šæœ¬ - mainç”¨æˆ·ç‰ˆæœ¬
LOG_DIR="/home/main/logs"
NGINX_LOG="/var/log/nginx/access.log"
TIMESTAMP=$(date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M")
OUTPUT_FILE="$LOG_DIR/stats_$TIMESTAMP.json"

# ç¡®ä¿æ—¥å¿—ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR"

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»24å°æ—¶æ•°æ®
echo "ç”Ÿæˆ24å°æ—¶è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡..." > "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

# è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´å’Œ24å°æ—¶å‰çš„æ—¶é—´
current_epoch=$(date +%s)
yesterday_epoch=$((current_epoch - 86400))

# æå–è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶çš„è®¿é—®è®°å½•å¹¶æŒ‰å°æ—¶ç»Ÿè®¡
{
    cat "$NGINX_LOG" 2>/dev/null
    cat /var/log/nginx/access.log.1 2>/dev/null
    cat /var/log/nginx/access.log.*.gz 2>/dev/null | zcat 2>/dev/null
} | grep -E "GET / HTTP" | \
awk -v yesterday="$yesterday_epoch" '
{
    # è§£ææ—¶é—´æˆ³ [dd/Mon/yyyy:hh:mm:ss +timezone]
    gsub(/\[/, "", $4)
    cmd = "date -d \"" $4 "\" +%s"
    cmd | getline timestamp
    close(cmd)
    
    if (timestamp >= yesterday) {
        cmd2 = "date -d \"" $4 "\" +%H"
        cmd2 | getline hour
        close(cmd2)
        hours[hour]++
    }
}
END {
    for (i = 0; i < 24; i++) {
        printf "%d %02d\n", (hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] ? hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] : 0), i
    }
}' | sort -k2 -n > /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# ç”ŸæˆJSONæ ¼å¼æ•°æ®
echo '{"hourly_data":[' > "$OUTPUT_FILE"

total=0
peak_count=0
peak_hour=0

for hour in {0..23}; do
    count=$(grep -E "^\s*[0-9]+\s+$(printf "%02d" $hour)$" /tmp/hourly_raw.txt | awk '{print $1}')
    [[ -z "$count" ]] && count=0
    
    total=$((total + count))
    
    if [[ $count -gt $peak_count ]]; then
        peak_count=$count
        peak_hour=$hour
    fi
    
    if [[ $hour -eq 23 ]]; then
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    else
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}," >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    fi
done

avg=$((total / 24))

cat >> "$OUTPUT_FILE" << EOF
],
"summary":{
"total_visits":$total,
"peak_hour":"$(printf "%02d:00" $peak_hour)",
"avg_hourly":$avg,
"last_update":"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')"
},
"timestamp":"$TIMESTAMP"
}
EOF

# æ¸…ç†æ—§æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶(ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘10ä¸ª)
ls -t "$LOG_DIR"/stats_*.json 2>/dev/null | tail -n +11 | xargs rm -f 2>/dev/null || true

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# åŒæ­¥åˆ°wwwå­˜å‚¨æ¡¶çš„logç›®å½•
cp "$OUTPUT_FILE" "/mnt/www/log/" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "$(date): Stats generated - $OUTPUT_FILE, Total: $total visits" >> "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

current_epoch=$(date +%s)
yesterday_epoch=$((current_epoch - 86400))

# æå–è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶çš„è®¿é—®è®°å½•å¹¶æŒ‰å°æ—¶ç»Ÿè®¡
{
    cat "$NGINX_LOG" 2>/dev/null
    cat /var/log/nginx/access.log.1 2>/dev/null
    cat /var/log/nginx/access.log.*.gz 2>/dev/null | zcat 2>/dev/null
} | grep -E "GET / HTTP" | \
awk -v yesterday="$yesterday_epoch" '
{
    # è§£ææ—¶é—´æˆ³ [dd/Mon/yyyy:hh:mm:ss +timezone]
    gsub(/\[/, "", $4)
    cmd = "date -d \"" $4 "\" +%s"
    cmd | getline timestamp
    close(cmd)
    
    if (timestamp >= yesterday) {
        cmd2 = "date -d \"" $4 "\" +%H"
        cmd2 | getline hour
        close(cmd2)
        hours[hour]++
    }
}
END {
    for (i = 0; i < 24; i++) {
        printf "%d %02d\n", (hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] ? hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] : 0), i
    }
}' | sort -k2 -n > /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# ç”ŸæˆJSONæ ¼å¼æ•°æ®
echo '{"hourly_data":[' > "$OUTPUT_FILE"

total=0
peak_count=0
peak_hour=0

for hour in {0..23}; do
    count=$(awk -v h="$(printf "%02d" $hour)" '$2 == h {print $1}' /tmp/hourly_raw.txt)
    [[ -z "$count" ]] && count=0
    
    total=$((total + count))
    
    if [[ $count -gt $peak_count ]]; then
        peak_count=$count
        peak_hour=$hour
    fi
    
    if [[ $hour -eq 23 ]]; then
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    else
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}," >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    fi
done

avg=$((total / 24))

cat >> "$OUTPUT_FILE" << EOF
],
"summary":{
"total_visits":$total,
"peak_hour":"$(printf "%02d:00" $peak_hour)",
"avg_hourly":$avg,
"last_update":"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')"
},
"timestamp":"$TIMESTAMP"
}
EOF

# æ¸…ç†æ—§æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶(ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘10ä¸ª)
ls -t "$LOG_DIR"/stats_*.json 2>/dev/null | tail -n +11 | xargs rm -f 2>/dev/null || true

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# åŒæ­¥åˆ°wwwå­˜å‚¨æ¡¶çš„logç›®å½•
cp "$OUTPUT_FILE" "/mnt/www/log/" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "$(date): Stats generated - $OUTPUT_FILE, Total: $total visits" >> "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

#!/bin/bash

# è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥å¿—å¤„ç†è„šæœ¬ - mainç”¨æˆ·ç‰ˆæœ¬
LOG_DIR="/home/main/logs"
NGINX_LOG="/var/log/nginx/access.log"
TIMESTAMP=$(date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M")
OUTPUT_FILE="$LOG_DIR/stats_$TIMESTAMP.json"

# ç¡®ä¿æ—¥å¿—ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR"

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»24å°æ—¶æ•°æ®
echo "ç”Ÿæˆ24å°æ—¶è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡..." > "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

# è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´å’Œ24å°æ—¶å‰çš„æ—¶é—´
current_epoch=$(date +%s)
yesterday_epoch=$((current_epoch - 86400))

# æå–è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶çš„è®¿é—®è®°å½•å¹¶æŒ‰å°æ—¶ç»Ÿè®¡
{
    cat "$NGINX_LOG" 2>/dev/null
    cat /var/log/nginx/access.log.1 2>/dev/null
    cat /var/log/nginx/access.log.*.gz 2>/dev/null | zcat 2>/dev/null
} | grep -E "GET / HTTP" | \
awk -v yesterday="$yesterday_epoch" '
{
    # è§£ææ—¶é—´æˆ³ [dd/Mon/yyyy:hh:mm:ss +timezone]
    gsub(/\[/, "", $4)
    cmd = "date -d \"" $4 "\" +%s"
    cmd | getline timestamp
    close(cmd)
    
    if (timestamp >= yesterday) {
        cmd2 = "date -d \"" $4 "\" +%H"
        cmd2 | getline hour
        close(cmd2)
        hours[hour]++
    }
}
END {
    for (i = 0; i < 24; i++) {
        printf "%d %02d\n", (hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] ? hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] : 0), i
    }
}' | sort -k2 -n > /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# ç”ŸæˆJSONæ ¼å¼æ•°æ®
echo '{"hourly_data":[' > "$OUTPUT_FILE"

total=0
peak_count=0
peak_hour=0

for hour in {0..23}; do
    count=$(awk -v h="$(printf "%02d" $hour)" '$2 == h {print $1}' /tmp/hourly_raw.txt)
    [[ -z "$count" ]] && count=0
    
    total=$((total + count))
    
    if [[ $count -gt $peak_count ]]; then
        peak_count=$count
        peak_hour=$hour
    fi
    
    if [[ $hour -eq 23 ]]; then
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    else
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}," >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    fi
done

avg=$((total / 24))

cat >> "$OUTPUT_FILE" << EOF
],
"summary":{
"total_visits":$total,
"peak_hour":"$(printf "%02d:00" $peak_hour)",
"peak_count":$peak_count,
"avg_hourly":$avg,
"current_hour":"$(date '+%H')",
"current_hour_visits":$(awk -v h="$(date '+%H')" '$2 == h {print $1}' /tmp/hourly_raw.txt | head -1),
"last_update":"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')",
"period":"è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶"
},
"timestamp":"$TIMESTAMP"
}
EOF

# æ¸…ç†æ—§æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶(ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘10ä¸ª)
ls -t "$LOG_DIR"/stats_*.json 2>/dev/null | tail -n +11 | xargs rm -f 2>/dev/null || true

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# åŒæ­¥åˆ°wwwå­˜å‚¨æ¡¶çš„logç›®å½•
cp "$OUTPUT_FILE" "/mnt/www/log/" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "$(date): Stats generated - $OUTPUT_FILE, Total: $total visits" >> "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

#!/bin/bash

# æ™ºèƒ½æ¶æ„IPæ£€æµ‹å’Œå°ç¦ç³»ç»Ÿ

LOG_DIR="/home/main/logs"
SECURITY_LOG="$LOG_DIR/security_scan.log"

NGINX_LOG="/var/log/nginx/access.log"

# åˆ›å»ºå¿…è¦ç›®å½•

# å®šä¹‰æ¶æ„è¡Œä¸ºç‰¹å¾æ¨¡å¼
declare -A MALICIOUS_PATTERNS=(
    ["è·¯å¾„éå†"]="\.git/|\.env|/config/|/vendor/|%2e%2e|\.\./\.\./|\.\.%2f"
    ["PHPæ¼æ´æ‰«æ"]="phpinfo|test\.php|eval-stdin\.php|php-info\.php|info\.php"
    ["ä»£ç æ³¨å…¥"]="allow_url_include|auto_prepend_file|php://input|base64_decode|eval\("
    ["ç›®å½•éå†"]="cgi-bin/\.\.%2f|cgi-bin/\.\./"
    ["WordPressæ‰«æ"]"wp-admin|xmlrpc\.php|wp-includes|wp-content|wp-login"
    ["ç³»ç»Ÿæ¢æµ‹"]="/etc/passwd|/proc/|/sys/|/usr/bin|/bin/sh"
    ["æ•°æ®åº“æ¢æµ‹"]"phpmyadmin|phpMyAdmin|adminer|mysql|postgresql"
    ["æ¶æ„å·¥å…·UA"]"Go-http-client|libredtail|zgrab|masscan|nmap|sqlmap|nikto"

    ["æ¶æ„å·¥å…·UA"]"Go-http-client|libredtail|zgrab|masscan|nmap|sqlmap|nikto"
)

# æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¨å¤©çš„æ—¥å¿—ï¼ˆé¿å…æ£€æŸ¥å¤ªä¹…è¿œçš„æ—¥å¿—å½±å“æ€§èƒ½ï¼‰
YESTERDAY=$(date -d "yesterday" '+%d/%b/%Y')
TODAY=$(date '+%d/%b/%Y')

echo "[$DATE] åˆ†ææ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´: $YESTERDAY å’Œ $TODAY" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"

# æå–æœ€è¿‘24å°æ—¶çš„è®¿é—®æ—¥å¿—
grep -E "($YESTERDAY|$TODAY)" "$NGINX_LOG" > "$TEMP_DIR/recent_logs.txt"

# åˆ†æå„ç±»æ¶æ„è¡Œä¸º
echo "[$DATE] å¼€å§‹æ¶æ„è¡Œä¸ºæ¨¡å¼åˆ†æ..." >> "$SECURITY_LOG"

# å­˜å‚¨å¯ç–‘IP
> "$TEMP_DIR/suspicious_ips.txt"

for pattern_name in "${!MALICIOUS_PATTERNS[@]}"; do
    pattern="${MALICIOUS_PATTERNS[$pattern_name]}"
    echo "[$DATE] æ£€æµ‹ $pattern_name æ¨¡å¼..." >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
    
    # æŸ¥æ‰¾åŒ¹é…æ¶æ„æ¨¡å¼çš„IP
    grep -iE "$pattern" "$TEMP_DIR/recent_logs.txt" | \
    awk '{print $1}' | \
    sort | uniq -c | \
    awk -v pattern="$pattern_name" '$1 >= 3 {print $2 ":" pattern ":" $1}' >> "$TEMP_DIR/suspicious_ips.txt"
done

# æ£€æµ‹é«˜é¢‘404/400é”™è¯¯ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½æ˜¯æ‰«æè¡Œä¸ºï¼‰
echo "[$DATE] æ£€æµ‹é«˜é¢‘é”™è¯¯è®¿é—®..." >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
grep -E " (400|404|403|500) " "$TEMP_DIR/recent_logs.txt" | \
awk '{print $1}' | \
sort | uniq -c | \
awk '$1 >= 20 {print $2 ":é«˜é¢‘é”™è¯¯:" $1}' >> "$TEMP_DIR/suspicious_ips.txt"

# æ£€æµ‹å¼‚å¸¸User-Agent
echo "[$DATE] æ£€æµ‹å¼‚å¸¸User-Agent..." >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
grep -iE "(Go-http-client|libredtail|zgrab|masscan|nmap|sqlmap|nikto|python|wget|curl)" "$TEMP_DIR/recent_logs.txt" | \
awk '{print $1}' | \
sort | uniq -c | \
awk '$1 >= 5 {print $2 ":æ¶æ„å·¥å…·:" $1}' >> "$TEMP_DIR/suspicious_ips.txt"

# ç»Ÿè®¡å’Œå»é‡å¯ç–‘IP
if [ -s "$TEMP_DIR/suspicious_ips.txt" ]; then
    echo "[$DATE] å‘ç°å¯ç–‘IPæ´»åŠ¨:" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
    cat "$TEMP_DIR/suspicious_ips.txt" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
    
    # æå–IPåœ°å€å¹¶å»é‡
    cut -d':' -f1 "$TEMP_DIR/suspicious_ips.txt" | sort | uniq > "$TEMP_DIR/unique_malicious_ips.txt"
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²è¢«å°ç¦ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å¤å°ç¦
    > "$TEMP_DIR/new_bans.txt"
    
    while read -r ip; do
        if ! iptables -L INPUT -n | grep -q "$ip"; then
            # æ’é™¤å†…ç½‘IPå’Œæ­£å¸¸çš„CDN/äº‘æœåŠ¡å•†IPï¼ˆå¯æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦è°ƒæ•´ï¼‰
            if [[ ! "$ip" =~ ^(10\.|172\.1[6-9]\.|172\.2[0-9]\.|172\.3[0-1]\.|192\.168\.|127\.) ]]; then
                echo "$ip" >> "$TEMP_DIR/new_bans.txt"
            fi
        fi
    done < "$TEMP_DIR/unique_malicious_ips.txt"
    
    # æ‰§è¡Œå°ç¦
    if [ -s "$TEMP_DIR/new_bans.txt" ]; then
        ban_count=0
        while read -r ip; do
            # æ‰§è¡Œiptableså°ç¦
            if sudo iptables -I INPUT -s "$ip" -j DROP; then
                echo "[$DATE] æˆåŠŸå°ç¦æ¶æ„IP: $ip" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
                echo "[$DATE] $ip - æ¶æ„è¡Œä¸ºæ£€æµ‹å°ç¦" >> "$BANNED_IPS_LOG"
                ((ban_count++))
            else
                echo "[$DATE] å°ç¦å¤±è´¥: $ip" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
            fi
        done < "$TEMP_DIR/new_bans.txt"
        
        if [ $ban_count -gt 0 ]; then
            # ä¿å­˜iptablesè§„åˆ™
            sudo iptables-save > /tmp/iptables_rules_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).rules
            echo "[$DATE] æœ¬æ¬¡å…±å°ç¦ $ban_count ä¸ªæ¶æ„IP" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
            
            # å‘é€ç®€å•é€šçŸ¥åˆ°ç³»ç»Ÿæ—¥å¿—
            logger "Security: å°ç¦äº† $ban_count ä¸ªæ¶æ„IP"
        fi
    else
        echo "[$DATE] æ²¡æœ‰æ–°çš„IPéœ€è¦å°ç¦" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
    fi
else
    echo "[$DATE] æœªå‘ç°å¯ç–‘IPæ´»åŠ¨" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
fi

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -rf "$TEMP_DIR"

# æ¸…ç†æ—§æ—¥å¿—ï¼ˆä¿ç•™30å¤©ï¼‰
find "$LOG_DIR" -name "security_scan.log" -mtime +30 -delete 2>/dev/null
find "$LOG_DIR" -name "banned_ips.log" -mtime +30 -delete 2>/dev/null

echo "[$DATE] === æ¶æ„IPæ‰«æå®Œæˆ ===" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"
echo "" >> "$SECURITY_LOG"

#!/bin/bash

# å®‰å…¨ç®¡ç†å·¥å…· - ç®¡ç†IPé»‘åå•å’ŒæŸ¥çœ‹å®‰å…¨çŠ¶æ€
# Usage: ./security_manager.sh [list|ban|unban|status|stats]

LOG_DIR="/home/main/logs"
SECURITY_LOG="$LOG_DIR/security_scan.log"
BANNED_IPS_LOG="$LOG_DIR/banned_ips.log"

show_help() {
    echo "ğŸ›¡ï¸  å®‰å…¨ç®¡ç†å·¥å…·"
    echo "Usage: $0 [command] [arguments]"
    echo ""
    echo "Commands:"
    echo "  list          - æ˜¾ç¤ºæ‰€æœ‰è¢«å°ç¦çš„IP"
    echo "  ban <IP>      - æ‰‹åŠ¨å°ç¦æŒ‡å®šIP"
    echo "  unban <IP>    - è§£å°æŒ‡å®šIP"
    echo "  status        - æ˜¾ç¤ºå®‰å…¨æ‰«æçŠ¶æ€"
    echo "  stats         - æ˜¾ç¤ºå®‰å…¨ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯"
    echo "  clean         - æ¸…ç†è¶…è¿‡30å¤©çš„IPå°ç¦ï¼ˆæ…ç”¨ï¼‰"
    echo ""
    echo "Examples:"
    echo "  $0 list"
    echo "  $0 ban 192.168.1.100"
    echo "  $0 unban 192.168.1.100"
    echo "  $0 stats"
}

list_banned_ips() {
    echo "ğŸš« å½“å‰è¢«å°ç¦çš„IPåˆ—è¡¨ï¼š"
    echo "===================="
    
    # ä»iptablesè·å–å°ç¦åˆ—è¡¨
    banned_count=0
    while read -r line; do
        if echo "$line" | grep -q "DROP.*all.*--"; then
            ip=$(echo "$line" | awk '{print $4}')
            if [[ "$ip" != "anywhere" && "$ip" != "0.0.0.0/0" ]]; then
                echo "ğŸ”´ $ip"
                ((banned_count++))
            fi
        fi
    done < <(iptables -L INPUT -n | grep "DROP")
    
    echo "===================="
    echo "ğŸ“Š æ€»è®¡å°ç¦IPæ•°é‡: $banned_count"
    
    if [ -f "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" ]; then
        echo ""
        echo "ğŸ“… æœ€è¿‘å°ç¦è®°å½• (æœ€å5æ¡):"
        tail -5 "$BANNED_IPS_LOG"
    fi
}

ban_ip() {
    local ip="$1"
    if [[ -z "$ip" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ è¯·æŒ‡å®šè¦å°ç¦çš„IPåœ°å€"
        return 1
    fi
    
    # éªŒè¯IPæ ¼å¼
    if [[ ! "$ip" =~ ^[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}$ ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æ— æ•ˆçš„IPåœ°å€æ ¼å¼: $ip"
        return 1
    fi
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²è¢«å°ç¦
    if iptables -L INPUT -n | grep -q "$ip"; then
        echo "âš ï¸  IP $ip å·²ç»åœ¨å°ç¦åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­"
        return 1
    fi
    
    # æ‰§è¡Œå°ç¦
    if sudo iptables -I INPUT -s "$ip" -j DROP; then
        echo "âœ… æˆåŠŸå°ç¦IP: $ip"
        echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $ip - æ‰‹åŠ¨å°ç¦" >> "$BANNED_IPS_LOG"
        
        # ä¿å­˜è§„åˆ™
        sudo iptables-save > /tmp/iptables_manual_ban_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).rules
        logger "Security: æ‰‹åŠ¨å°ç¦IP $ip"
    else
        echo "âŒ å°ç¦å¤±è´¥: $ip"
        return 1
    fi
}

unban_ip() {
    local ip="$1"
    if [[ -z "$ip" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ è¯·æŒ‡å®šè¦è§£å°çš„IPåœ°å€"
        return 1
    fi
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åœ¨å°ç¦åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­
    if ! iptables -L INPUT -n | grep -q "$ip"; then
        echo "âš ï¸  IP $ip ä¸åœ¨å°ç¦åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­"
        return 1
    fi
    
    # æ‰§è¡Œè§£å°
    if sudo iptables -D INPUT -s "$ip" -j DROP; then
        echo "âœ… æˆåŠŸè§£å°IP: $ip"
        echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $ip - æ‰‹åŠ¨è§£å°" >> "$BANNED_IPS_LOG"
        
        # ä¿å­˜è§„åˆ™
        sudo iptables-save > /tmp/iptables_manual_unban_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).rules
        logger "Security: æ‰‹åŠ¨è§£å°IP $ip"
    else
        echo "âŒ è§£å°å¤±è´¥: $ip"
        return 1
    fi
}

show_status() {
    echo "ğŸ›¡ï¸  å®‰å…¨é˜²æŠ¤çŠ¶æ€æŠ¥å‘Š"
    echo "======================"
    echo ""
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥å®‰å…¨æ‰«æè„šæœ¬
    if [ -f "/home/main/scripts/security_scan.sh" ]; then
        echo "âœ… å®‰å…¨æ‰«æè„šæœ¬: å·²éƒ¨ç½²"
    else
        echo "âŒ å®‰å…¨æ‰«æè„šæœ¬: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°"
    fi
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡
    if crontab -l 2>/dev/null | grep -q "security_scan.sh"; then
        echo "âœ… å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡: å·²é…ç½® (æ¯æ—¥4:00AM)"
    else
        echo "âŒ å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡: æœªé…ç½®"
    fi
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥nginxé…ç½®
    if sudo nginx -t >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "âœ… Nginxé…ç½®: æ­£å¸¸"
    else
        echo "âŒ Nginxé…ç½®: å­˜åœ¨é—®é¢˜"
    fi
    
    # æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ€è¿‘æ‰«ææ—¶é—´
    if [ -f "$SECURITY_LOG" ]; then
        last_scan=$(tail -1 "$SECURITY_LOG" | grep -o "\[.*\]" | tr -d "[]")
        echo "ğŸ“… æœ€åæ‰«ææ—¶é—´: $last_scan"
    else
        echo "âš ï¸  å°šæœªæ‰§è¡Œè¿‡å®‰å…¨æ‰«æ"
    fi
    
    echo ""
    list_banned_ips
}

show_stats() {
    echo "ğŸ“Š å®‰å…¨ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯"
    echo "================"
    echo ""
    
    if [ -f "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" ]; then
        # ç»Ÿè®¡æ€»å°ç¦æ•°
        total_bans=$(grep -c "å°ç¦" "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
        echo "ğŸš« ç´¯è®¡å°ç¦IPæ•°é‡: $total_bans"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡ä»Šæ—¥å°ç¦æ•°
        today=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d')
        today_bans=$(grep "$today" "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" | grep -c "å°ç¦" || echo "0")
        echo "ğŸ“… ä»Šæ—¥æ–°å°ç¦: $today_bans"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡æœ¬å‘¨å°ç¦æ•°
        week_ago=$(date -d "7 days ago" '+%Y-%m-%d')
        week_bans=$(awk -v start="$week_ago" '$0 >= "["start && /å°ç¦/' "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" | wc -l)
        echo "ğŸ“Š æœ¬å‘¨å°ç¦: $week_bans"
        
        echo ""
        echo "ğŸ”¥ å°ç¦åŸå› ç»Ÿè®¡:"
        grep "å°ç¦" "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" | awk -F' - ' '{print $2}' | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr
    else
        echo "ğŸ“ æš‚æ— å°ç¦è®°å½•"
    fi
    
    # æ˜¾ç¤ºå½“å‰iptablesè§„åˆ™æ•°é‡
    current_rules=$(iptables -L INPUT | grep -c "DROP")
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ”’ å½“å‰é˜²ç«å¢™è§„åˆ™: $current_rules æ¡DROPè§„åˆ™"
}

clean_old_bans() {
    echo "ğŸ§¹ æ¸…ç†è¶…è¿‡30å¤©çš„IPå°ç¦è§„åˆ™..."
    echo "âš ï¸  æ­¤æ“ä½œå°†è§£å°æ‰€æœ‰è¶…è¿‡30å¤©çš„IPï¼Œç¡®å®šç»§ç»­å—? (y/N)"
    read -r confirm
    
    if [[ "$confirm" != "y" && "$confirm" != "Y" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æ“ä½œå·²å–æ¶ˆ"
        return 1
    fi
    
    # è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ›´å¤æ‚çš„é€»è¾‘æ¥è·Ÿè¸ªIPå°ç¦æ—¶é—´
    # ç®€å•å®ç°ï¼šæ¸…ç†æ—¥å¿—ä¸­30å¤©å‰çš„è®°å½•
    if [ -f "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" ]; then
        backup_file="${BANNED_IPS_LOG}.backup.$(date +%Y%m%d)"
        cp "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" "$backup_file"
        
        # åªä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘30å¤©çš„è®°å½•
        awk -v cutoff="$(date -d '30 days ago' '+%Y-%m-%d')" '$0 >= "["cutoff' "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" > "${BANNED_IPS_LOG}.tmp"
        mv "${BANNED_IPS_LOG}.tmp" "$BANNED_IPS_LOG"
        
        echo "âœ… å·²æ¸…ç†æ—§è®°å½•ï¼Œå¤‡ä»½ä¿å­˜ä¸º: $backup_file"
    fi
}

# ä¸»ç¨‹åºé€»è¾‘
case "$1" in
    "list")
        list_banned_ips
        ;;
    "ban")
        ban_ip "$2"
        ;;
    "unban")
        unban_ip "$2"
        ;;
    "status")
        show_status
        ;;
    "stats")
        show_stats
        ;;
    "clean")
        clean_old_bans
        ;;
    "")
        show_help
        ;;
    *)
        echo "âŒ æœªçŸ¥å‘½ä»¤: $1"
        show_help
        exit 1
        ;;
esac

show_status() {

    echo "======================"
    echo ""
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥å®‰å…¨æ‰«æè„šæœ¬
    if [ -f "/home/main/scripts/security_scan.sh" ]; then
        echo "âœ… å®‰å…¨æ‰«æè„šæœ¬: å·²éƒ¨ç½²"
    else
        echo "âŒ å®‰å…¨æ‰«æè„šæœ¬: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°"
    fi
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡
    if crontab -l 2>/dev/null | grep -q "security_scan.sh"; then
        echo "âœ… å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡: å·²é…ç½® (æ¯æ—¥4:00AM)"
    else
        echo "âŒ å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡: æœªé…ç½®"
    fi
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥nginxé…ç½®
    if sudo nginx -t >/dev/null 2>&1; then

    else
        echo "âŒ Nginxé…ç½®: å­˜åœ¨é—®é¢˜"
    fi
    
    # æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ€è¿‘æ‰«ææ—¶é—´
    if [ -f "$SECURITY_LOG" ]; then
        last_scan=$(tail -1 "$SECURITY_LOG" | grep -o "\[.*\]" | tr -d "[]")
        echo "ğŸ“… æœ€åæ‰«ææ—¶é—´: $last_scan"
    else
        echo "âš ï¸  å°šæœªæ‰§è¡Œè¿‡å®‰å…¨æ‰«æ"
    fi
    
    echo ""
    list_banned_ips
}

show_stats() {
    echo "ğŸ“Š å®‰å…¨ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯"
    echo "================"
    echo ""
    
    if [ -f "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" ]; then
        # ç»Ÿè®¡æ€»å°ç¦æ•°
        total_bans=$(grep -c "å°ç¦" "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
        echo "ğŸš« ç´¯è®¡å°ç¦IPæ•°é‡: $total_bans"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡ä»Šæ—¥å°ç¦æ•°
        today=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d')
        today_bans=$(grep "$today" "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" | grep -c "å°ç¦" || echo "0")
        echo "ğŸ“… ä»Šæ—¥æ–°å°ç¦: $today_bans"
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡æœ¬å‘¨å°ç¦æ•°
        week_ago=$(date -d "7 days ago" '+%Y-%m-%d')
        week_bans=$(awk -v start="$week_ago" '$0 >= "["start && /å°ç¦/' "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" | wc -l)
        echo "ğŸ“Š æœ¬å‘¨å°ç¦: $week_bans"
        
        echo ""
        echo "ğŸ”¥ å°ç¦åŸå› ç»Ÿè®¡:"
        grep "å°ç¦" "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" | awk -F' - ' '{print $2}' | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr
    else
        echo "ğŸ“ æš‚æ— å°ç¦è®°å½•"
    fi
    
    # æ˜¾ç¤ºå½“å‰iptablesè§„åˆ™æ•°é‡
    current_rules=$(iptables -L INPUT | grep -c "DROP")
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ”’ å½“å‰é˜²ç«å¢™è§„åˆ™: $current_rules æ¡DROPè§„åˆ™"
}

clean_old_bans() {
    echo "ğŸ§¹ æ¸…ç†è¶…è¿‡30å¤©çš„IPå°ç¦è§„åˆ™..."
    echo "âš ï¸  æ­¤æ“ä½œå°†è§£å°æ‰€æœ‰è¶…è¿‡30å¤©çš„IPï¼Œç¡®å®šç»§ç»­å—? (y/N)"

    if [[ "$confirm" != "y" && "$confirm" != "Y" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æ“ä½œå·²å–æ¶ˆ"
        return 1
    fi
    
    # è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ›´å¤æ‚çš„é€»è¾‘æ¥è·Ÿè¸ªIPå°ç¦æ—¶é—´
    # ç®€å•å®ç°ï¼šæ¸…ç†æ—¥å¿—ä¸­30å¤©å‰çš„è®°å½•
    if [ -f "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" ]; then

        cp "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" "$backup_file"

        awk -v cutoff="$(date -d '30 days ago' '+%Y-%m-%d')" '$0 >= "["cutoff' "$BANNED_IPS_LOG" > "${BANNED_IPS_LOG}.tmp"

    fi

# ä¸»ç¨‹åºé€»è¾‘
case "$1" in

    "ban")

    "unban")

        ;;
    "status")

    "")

        ;;
    *)
        echo "âŒ æœªçŸ¥å‘½ä»¤: $1"
        show_help

        ;;

#!/bin/bash

# è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡æ—¥å¿—å¤„ç†è„šæœ¬ - mainç”¨æˆ·ç‰ˆæœ¬
LOG_DIR="/home/main/logs"
NGINX_LOG="/var/log/nginx/access.log"
TIMESTAMP=$(date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M")
OUTPUT_FILE="$LOG_DIR/stats_$TIMESTAMP.json"

# ç¡®ä¿æ—¥å¿—ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR"

# ç”Ÿæˆè¿‡å»24å°æ—¶æ•°æ®
echo "ç”Ÿæˆ24å°æ—¶è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡..." > "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

# æå–è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶çš„è®¿é—®è®°å½•å¹¶æŒ‰å°æ—¶ç»Ÿè®¡
{
    cat "$NGINX_LOG" 2>/dev/null
    cat /var/log/nginx/access.log.1 2>/dev/null
} | grep -E "GET / HTTP" | \
awk '
{
    # æå–æ—¶é—´æˆ³ä¸­çš„å°æ—¶ [dd/Mon/yyyy:hh:mm:ss +timezone]
    if (match($4, /[0-9]{2}\/[A-Za-z]{3}\/[0-9]{4}:([0-9]{2}):/, hour_match)) {
        hour = hour_match[1]
        hours[hour]++
    }
}
END {
    for (i = 0; i < 24; i++) {
        printf "%d %02d\n", (hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] ? hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] : 0), i
    }
}' | sort -k2 -n > /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# ç”ŸæˆJSONæ ¼å¼æ•°æ®
echo '{"hourly_data":[' > "$OUTPUT_FILE"

total=0
peak_count=0
peak_hour=0

for hour in {0..23}; do
    count=$(awk -v h="$(printf "%02d" $hour)" '$2 == h {print $1}' /tmp/hourly_raw.txt)
    [[ -z "$count" ]] && count=0
    
    total=$((total + count))
    
    if [[ $count -gt $peak_count ]]; then
        peak_count=$count
        peak_hour=$hour
    fi
    
    if [[ $hour -eq 23 ]]; then
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    else
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}," >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    fi
done

avg=$((total / 24))

cat >> "$OUTPUT_FILE" << EOF
],
"summary":{
"total_visits":$total,
"peak_hour":"$(printf "%02d:00" $peak_hour)",
"peak_count":$peak_count,
"avg_hourly":$avg,
"current_hour":"$(date '+%H')",
"current_hour_visits":$(awk -v h="$(date '+%H')" '$2 == h {print $1}' /tmp/hourly_raw.txt | head -1),
"last_update":"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')",
"period":"è¿‡å»24å°æ—¶"
},
"timestamp":"$TIMESTAMP"
}
EOF

# æ¸…ç†æ—§æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶(ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘10ä¸ª)
ls -t "$LOG_DIR"/stats_*.json 2>/dev/null | tail -n +11 | xargs rm -f 2>/dev/null || true

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# åŒæ­¥åˆ°wwwå­˜å‚¨æ¡¶çš„logç›®å½•
cp "$OUTPUT_FILE" "/mnt/www/log/" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "$(date): Stats generated - $OUTPUT_FILE, Total: $total visits" >> "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

#!/bin/bash

# å¢å¼ºç‰ˆè®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡è„šæœ¬ - æ”¯æŒ24å°æ—¶+7å¤©ç»Ÿè®¡
LOG_DIR="/home/main/logs"
NGINX_LOG="/var/log/nginx/access.log"
TIMESTAMP=$(date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M")
OUTPUT_FILE="$LOG_DIR/stats_$TIMESTAMP.json"

# ç¡®ä¿æ—¥å¿—ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
mkdir -p "$LOG_DIR"

echo "ç”Ÿæˆ7å¤©+24å°æ—¶è®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡..." > "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

# === 24å°æ—¶æ¯å°æ—¶ç»Ÿè®¡ ===
{
    cat "$NGINX_LOG" 2>/dev/null
    cat /var/log/nginx/access.log.1 2>/dev/null
} | grep -E "GET / HTTP" | \
awk '
{
    # æå–æ—¶é—´æˆ³ä¸­çš„å°æ—¶ [dd/Mon/yyyy:hh:mm:ss +timezone]
    if (match($4, /[0-9]{2}\/[A-Za-z]{3}\/[0-9]{4}:([0-9]{2}):/, hour_match)) {
        hour = hour_match[1]
        hours[hour]++
    }
}
END {
    for (i = 0; i < 24; i++) {
        printf "%d %02d\n", (hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] ? hours[sprintf("%02d", i)] : 0), i
    }
}' | sort -k2 -n > /tmp/hourly_raw.txt

# === 7å¤©æ¯æ—¥ç»Ÿè®¡ ===
{
    cat "$NGINX_LOG" 2>/dev/null
    cat /var/log/nginx/access.log.1 2>/dev/null  
    # å°è¯•è·å–æ›´å¤šå†å²æ—¥å¿—
    find /var/log/nginx/ -name "access.log*" -type f 2>/dev/null | while read logfile; do
        if [[ $logfile =~ \.gz$ ]]; then
            zcat "$logfile" 2>/dev/null | head -1000
        else
            cat "$logfile" 2>/dev/null | head -1000
        fi
    done
} | grep -E "GET / HTTP" | \
awk '
BEGIN {
    # è·å–ä»Šå¤©å’Œè¿‡å»6å¤©çš„æ—¥æœŸ
    "date +%d/%b/%Y" | getline today
    for (i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
        cmd = "date -d \""i" days ago\" +\"%d/%b/%Y\""
        cmd | getline date
        dates[i] = date
        close(cmd)
        daily[date] = 0
    }
}
{
    # æå–æ—¥æœŸ [dd/Mon/yyyy:hh:mm:ss +timezone]
    if (match($4, /\[([0-9]{2}\/[A-Za-z]{3}\/[0-9]{4}):/, date_match)) {
        date = date_match[1]
        # åªç»Ÿè®¡è¿‡å»7å¤©çš„æ•°æ®
        for (d in daily) {
            if (date == d) {
                daily[d]++
                break
            }
        }
    }
}
END {
    for (i = 6; i >= 0; i--) {
        date = dates[i]
        count = daily[date] ? daily[date] : 0
        printf "%s %d\n", date, count
    }
}' > /tmp/daily_raw.txt

# å¼€å§‹ç”ŸæˆJSON
echo '{' > "$OUTPUT_FILE"

# === 24å°æ—¶æ•°æ® ===
echo '"hourly_data":[' >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"

total_24h=0
peak_count=0
peak_hour=0

for hour in {0..23}; do
    count=$(awk -v h="$(printf "%02d" $hour)" '$2 == h {print $1}' /tmp/hourly_raw.txt)
    [[ -z "$count" ]] && count=0
    
    total_24h=$((total_24h + count))
    
    if [[ $count -gt $peak_count ]]; then
        peak_count=$count
        peak_hour=$hour
    fi
    
    if [[ $hour -eq 23 ]]; then
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    else
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}," >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    fi
done

echo '],' >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"

# === 7å¤©æ•°æ® ===
echo '"daily_data":[' >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"

total_7d=0
day_count=0

while read -r date count; do
    total_7d=$((total_7d + count))
    
    # è½¬æ¢æ—¥æœŸæ ¼å¼ä¸ºæ›´å‹å¥½çš„æ˜¾ç¤º
    month_day=$(echo "$date" | awk -F'/' '{print $1"/"$2}')
    weekday=$(date -d "$date" "+%a" 2>/dev/null || echo "")
    
    if [[ $day_count -eq 6 ]]; then
        echo "{\"date\":\"$date\",\"label\":\"$month_day $weekday\",\"count\":$count}" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    else
        echo "{\"date\":\"$date\",\"label\":\"$month_day $weekday\",\"count\":$count}," >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    fi
    
    ((day_count++))
done < /tmp/daily_raw.txt

echo '],' >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"

# === æ±‡æ€»æ•°æ® ===
avg_24h=$((total_24h / 24))
avg_7d=$((total_7d / 7))
current_hour_visits=$(awk -v h="$(date '+%H')" '$2 == h {print $1}' /tmp/hourly_raw.txt | head -1)
[[ -z "$current_hour_visits" ]] && current_hour_visits=0

# è·å–å¢é•¿è¶‹åŠ¿
today_visits=$(head -1 /tmp/daily_raw.txt | awk '{print $2}')
yesterday_visits=$(sed -n '2p' /tmp/daily_raw.txt | awk '{print $2}')
if [[ $yesterday_visits -gt 0 ]]; then
    growth=$((((today_visits - yesterday_visits) * 100) / yesterday_visits))
    if [[ $growth -gt 0 ]]; then
        growth_text="+${growth}%"
    else
        growth_text="${growth}%"
    fi
else
    growth_text="æ–°å¢"
fi

cat >> "$OUTPUT_FILE" << EOF
"summary":{
"total_visits_24h":$total_24h,
"total_visits_7d":$total_7d,
"peak_hour":"$(printf "%02d:00" $peak_hour)",
"peak_count":$peak_count,
"avg_hourly":$avg_24h,
"avg_daily":$avg_7d,
"current_hour":"$(date '+%H')",
"current_hour_visits":$current_hour_visits,
"today_visits":$today_visits,
"yesterday_visits":$yesterday_visits,
"growth_trend":"$growth_text",
"last_update":"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')",
"period":"è¿‡å»7å¤©+24å°æ—¶"
},
"timestamp":"$TIMESTAMP"
}
EOF

# æ¸…ç†æ—§æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶(ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘15ä¸ª)
ls -t "$LOG_DIR"/stats_*.json 2>/dev/null | tail -n +16 | xargs rm -f 2>/dev/null || true

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f /tmp/hourly_raw.txt /tmp/daily_raw.txt

# åŒæ­¥åˆ°wwwå­˜å‚¨æ¡¶çš„logç›®å½•
mkdir -p "/mnt/www/log/" 2>/dev/null || true
cp "$OUTPUT_FILE" "/mnt/www/log/" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "$(date): Enhanced stats generated - $OUTPUT_FILE" >> "$LOG_DIR/process.log"
echo "  24h total: $total_24h visits, 7d total: $total_7d visits" >> "$LOG_DIR/process.log"

        peak_count=$count
        peak_hour=$hour
    fi
    
    if [[ $hour -eq 23 ]]; then
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    else
        echo "{\"hour\":$hour,\"count\":$count}," >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    fi
done

echo '],' >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"

# === 7å¤©æ•°æ® ===
echo '"daily_data":[' >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"

total_7d=0
day_count=0

while read -r date count; do
    total_7d=$((total_7d + count))
    
    # è½¬æ¢æ—¥æœŸæ ¼å¼ä¸ºæ›´å‹å¥½çš„æ˜¾ç¤º
    month_day=$(echo "$date" | awk -F'/' '{print $1"/"$2}')
    weekday=$(date -d "$date" "+%a" 2>/dev/null || echo "")
    
    if [[ $day_count -eq 6 ]]; then
        echo "{\"date\":\"$date\",\"label\":\"$month_day $weekday\",\"count\":$count}" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    else
        echo "{\"date\":\"$date\",\"label\":\"$month_day $weekday\",\"count\":$count}," >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"
    fi
    
    ((day_count++))
done < /tmp/daily_raw.txt

echo '],' >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"

# === æ±‡æ€»æ•°æ® ===
avg_24h=$((total_24h / 24))
avg_7d=$((total_7d / 7))
current_hour_visits=$(awk -v h="$(date '+%H')" '$2 == h {print $1}' /tmp/hourly_raw.txt | head -1)
[[ -z "$current_hour_visits" ]] && current_hour_visits=0

# è·å–å¢é•¿è¶‹åŠ¿
today_visits=$(head -1 /tmp/daily_raw.txt | awk '{print $2}')
yesterday_visits=$(sed -n '2p' /tmp/daily_raw.txt | awk '{print $2}')
if [[ $yesterday_visits -gt 0 ]]; then
    growth=$((((today_visits - yesterday_visits) * 100) / yesterday_visits))
    if [[ $growth -gt 0 ]]; then
        growth_text="+${growth}%"
    else
        growth_text="${growth}%"
    fi
else
    growth_text="æ–°å¢"
fi

cat >> "$OUTPUT_FILE" << EOF
"summary":{
"total_visits_24h":$total_24h,
"total_visits_7d":$total_7d,
"peak_hour":"$(printf "%02d:00" $peak_hour)",
"peak_count":$peak_count,
"avg_hourly":$avg_24h,
"avg_daily":$avg_7d,
"current_hour":"$(date '+%H')",
"current_hour_visits":$current_hour_visits,
"today_visits":$today_visits,
"yesterday_visits":$yesterday_visits,
"growth_trend":"$growth_text",
"last_update":"$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')",
"period":"è¿‡å»7å¤©+24å°æ—¶"
},
"timestamp":"$TIMESTAMP"
}
EOF

# æ¸…ç†æ—§æ—¥å¿—æ–‡ä»¶(ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘15ä¸ª)
ls -t "$LOG_DIR"/stats_*.json 2>/dev/null | tail -n +16 | xargs rm -f 2>/dev/null || true

# æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
rm -f /tmp/hourly_raw.txt /tmp/daily_raw.txt

# åŒæ­¥åˆ°wwwå­˜å‚¨æ¡¶çš„logç›®å½•
mkdir -p "/mnt/www/log/" 2>/dev/null || true
cp "$OUTPUT_FILE" "/mnt/www/log/" 2>/dev/null || true

echo "$(date): Enhanced stats generated - $OUTPUT_FILE" >> "$LOG_DIR/process.log"
echo "  24h total: $total_24h visits, 7d total: $total_7d visits" >> "$LOG_DIR/process.log"
